message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $10500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
